TopicTitle: Does Dark Multiplayer Have Online or No?

Articles.Content:
I was just messing around with the mod, but I couldn't find any online option. I tried looking around the forums, no luck. So I came here to ask if it has any online abilities at all?

Thanks.

Not sure if you're serious or not, but if you mean "Can I play on a public / internet server", the answer is yes after portforwarding, or checking out some of the public servers: http://d-mp.org/?s=DMP&p=serverlist

Not sure if you're serious or not, but if you mean "Can I play on a public / internet server", the answer is yes after portforwarding, or checking out some of the public servers: http://d-mp.org/?s=DMP&p=serverlist

Okay. Thank you. I was being serious, and I guess I should of worded it a bit better. I was in a hurry.
